title: Take a little time: infection control at work
creator_credit: Fiona Banks, Hilary Christmas, Film Victoria, Victoria. Health Dept. AIDS STD Unit and Tanglefoot Productions
brief_description: Designed for emergency care workers and addresses the risks and prevention of the occupational transmission of communicable diseases, particularly HIV and Hepatitis B. Presented by Dr. Gael Jennings and accompanied by a 10p. booklet.
